SELECT c.communityNum, c.subject, c.nickName, c.regDate FROM pick p LEFT JOIN community c ON p.communityNum = c.communityNum LEFT JOIN member m ON p.userCode = m.userCode WHERE p.userCode = #{userCode}
ORDER BY p.regDate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT r.recruitNum, r.categoryNum, r.subject, r.startDate, r.endDate, r.corporation FROM recruitPick rp LEFT JOIN recruit r ON rp.recruitNum = r.recruitNum LEFT JOIN member m ON rp.userCode = m.userCode WHERE rp.userCode = #{userCode}
ORDER BY rp.regDate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM ( SELECT c.communityNum, c.subject, c.nickName, c.regDate FROM pick p LEFT JOIN community c ON p.communityNum = c.communityNum LEFT JOIN member m ON p.userCode = m.userCode WHERE p.userCode = #{userCode} )
